hypothesis_content.title: BTC/ETH Ratio Momentum Reversal After Extreme Divergence
hypothesis_content.statement: When the BTC/ETH price ratio reaches extreme levels (>2 standard deviations from its 30-day rolling mean) AND the 3-day RSI of the ratio crosses above 30 (from below) during NEUTRAL regimes, BTC will outperform ETH over the next 5 trading days with >65% win rate.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extreme BTC/ETH ratios in neutral markets often reflect temporary sentiment shifts rather than fundamental repricing. The RSI cross indicates momentum exhaustion. Institutional rebalancing flows tend to normalize extreme cross-asset divergences in neutral regimes.
entry_conditions: BTC/ETH ratio 3-day RSI crosses above 30 from below

exit_conditions.take_profit: 5 days after entry OR BTC/ETH ratio returns to within 0.5 std of 30-day mean
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC/ETH ratio makes new 3-day low after entry

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Win rate < 65% over 100+ backtested instances OR average return < 1.2% over 5 days
